title: Why is the surrender vote majority rule?
body: I don't like how my teammates get to decide whether or not I lose the game. I should be able to decide if I want to lose, not somebody else. The more I play this game the more annoying flaws I encounter. Why should I be taking a loss because my teammates got mad and starting flaming each other, then surrendered? Is that my fault? It's absurd.

replies.body:
Considering you feed nearly every game, i bet your teammates accuse you of holding the games hostage and being a troll.

It goes both ways, and if you are this mad about the game by lv31, you should uninstall and go play something non-PvP.
And? They give up and flame and run it down. It doesn't matter how poorly I do, I still want to continue the game and try to win. Other people shouldn't be dictating that.
Dont play multiplayer games if you cant handle other people existing. 4 people have decided they have had enough, vs 1 who has not. Contrary to popular belief, you are not special.

Kid,

Stop trying to keep your team mate hostage.

If you were good enough to carry they wouldn't be voting to surrender.
So you respond by being toxic? This is the average league of legends player? No wonder the playerbase has declined, maybe I made a mistake trying this game out.
